channel.title: I seriously need help!
channel.description:
well im making a dungeoneering skill its going pretty good but how would i make it so you can buy items with the tokens the monsters drop? ive tried a few things and cant get it. Help would be nice , Example: the monster would drop 2 of some type of token then you would use that to buy chaotics and stuff.
Also how would i make it so when you craft runes you also get 1 token? same question but with a diffrent way of obtaining you would get like example: 23 nats and 1 token instead of just 23 nats. Thx

i know all that i want to know how to code that in -.-

item.title: I seriously need help!
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

If you are talking about using a token as a currency try to base it off of the tokkul currency if you have one. You can also set special points instead for a monster and they add up as points to a shop.

Read full topic
